# Motivation 
This website is my submission for the Digital Health Analyst at Maimonides Hospital, Brooklyn, NY. The results presented here demonstrate my data cleaning, analyses and presentation skills. 


# What you will find on this website: 
* A complete report including all data cleaning/analysis activities
* A workplan/analysis plan, in which I have clearly outlined the key questions regarding/steps required for completion this project.
* A page with selected analyses/results, which could be presented to lay stakeholders.
